00021         // this hack is necessary for calling the Go method.
00022         // c++0x <thread> isn't working atm.
00023         static void* execute_go(void* ctx) {
00024                 Mainloop* cptr = (Mainloop*)ctx;
00025                 cptr->Go();
00026                 return NULL;
00027         }
00028 
00029         void Mainloop::Go(){
00030                 Clock timer;
00031                 int frame = 0;
00032                 
00033                 while (started_){
00034                         clock_.Reset();
00035                         printf("fps: %f\n", frame / timer.ElapsedSec() );
00036                         /*
00037                           Do stuff here
00038 
00039                         */
00040                         usleep( (1e6 * 1/fps_) - clock_.ElapsedMicro() );
00041                         frame += 1;
00042                 }
00043         }

00045         MainloopErr Mainloop::Init2D(NPDevice* device2d){
00046                 if (device2d == 0){
00047                         return Bad2DDevice;
00048                 }
00049                 device2d_ = device2d;           
00050                 return InitSucceeds;
00051         }

00053         MainloopErr Mainloop::SetFramesPerSecond(double fps){
00054                 assert(fps > 0);
00055                 fps_ = fps;
00056                 return InitSucceeds;
00057         }

00059         MainloopErr Mainloop::Init(PluginObject* po){
00060                 if (po == 0) {
00061                         return InitFails;
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 if (!started_){
00065                         started_ = true;
00066                         plugin_ = po;
00067                         printf("scm <-- Init Loop\n");
00068 
00069                         // spawn thread here.
00070                         pthread_create(&loop_, NULL, execute_go, this);
00071                         return InitSucceeds;
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 SetFramesPerSecond(60);
00075                 return InitFails;
00076         }
